description: Exponent of 5 (value of j) in n-th number of form 2^i*5^j.
prog: (PARI) lista(nn) = {vec = vector(nn, i , i); subset = select(n->(n/(2^valuation(n,2)*5^valuation(n,5)) == 1), vec); for (i = 1, #subset, print1(valuation(subset[i], 5), ", "););} \\ _Michel Marcus_, Oct 01 2013
author: _Clark Kimberling_
